EmailTemplate.description: Sent out after completion of Week 6 Call.
EmailTemplate.name: VinPro ReportCard - New Acct F/U
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions would like to hear your feedback on the process of launching your new MotoSnap CRM/ILM!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Account.Name}{!Account.AccountNumber}{!POA__c.Dealer__c}
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
You have completed the six weekly scheduled VinPro calls with {!Account.Account_Manager__c}.
New Dealer Launch Review Manager's Daily Duties Sales Processes and Templates Orphan Customers, Trade-ins, Wishlist, and Inventory Reporting, Surveys, and Sales Goals Review and Utilization
Please take a few minutes to provide us with your feedback about your experience with the initial process of planning, integrating, launching and learning how to use your MotoSnap CRM/ILM. Your responses go a long way to helping us help you by evolving our practices and processes to better suit your needs.
Tell Vin!
Thank you from VinSolutions.
